column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Martin M. Snapp''' of [[Wikipedia:Yale University|Yale University]].<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Christina Scull]] and [[Wayne G. Hammond]]|articleurl=http://www.hammondandscull.com/addenda/chronology.html|articlename=Addenda and Corrigenda to ''The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide'' (2006) Vol. 1: Chronology|dated=|website=HS|accessed=17 April 2012}}</ref>
Thank you very much for your letter. It gave me great pleasure to learn of the interest of undergraduates at Yale in my in my work.

column1: With regard to your proposition: I do not deal with matters of that kind myself. They are in the hands of my publishers: Messrs. Allen & Unwin
column5: W.C.1. I am forwarding a copy of your letter to them
column6: and I expect you will hear from them in due course. With best wishes
